Series.Overview: Scrubs focuses on the lives of several people working at Sacred Heart, a teaching hospital. It features fast-paced dialogue, slapstick, and surreal vignettes presented mostly as the daydreams of the central character, Dr. John Michael "J.D." Dorian.
Wormwood Scrubs is a documentary series which takes a look at life for the inmates and staff at one of Europe's biggest prisons.
